title: Solid state synthesis of lead-free Sm-doped Na<sub>0.5</sub>Bi<sub>4.5</sub>Ti<sub>4</sub>O<sub>15</sub> ceramics for enhanced dielectric and electrical properties

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13
